summary: A small mod adding a craftable standalone Nightingale bow replica and arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][color=#ff0000]
This mod is OBSOLETE as being part of my new mod "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84871/?]The Art of Smithing[/url]".[/color][/center][/size]

It's a very simple mod allowing you to craft a replica of the Nightingale bow as well as assorted arrows.

[size=3][b]In Depth Description:[/b][/size]
The bow keeps the original model, though 50% thinner to make it more parctical. It is slightly more powerful than the Dragonbone Bow since I wanted to keep it until the end of the game. The arrows use the Daedric arrow and quiver meshes and textures. They are as strong as the Dragonbone arrows.
To keep it balanced, however, the crafting recipes will be available after the Trinity Restored quest, from the Thieves Guild.
Requires the Ebony Smithing perk to craft.

As I cannot do anything about textures, I stuck with the vanilla textures pathway, so any texture mod you have on both original items will be used for this mod.

[b][size=3]Future plans:[/size][/b]
- Add a craftable Nightingale blade

[size=3][b]Known Issues: [/b][/size]
- As the meshes of the bow are quite thinner than the original, the Nightingale logo got a bit deformed. I can't do anything about that.

[size=3][b]Special Thanks: [/b][/size]
- insaneplumber for allowing me to use his Nightingale bow meshes
author: VyseArcadia
